metadata.dcterms:title: Individual Histories of Edmonton-area People with Japanese Heritage (2013-2015)
metadata.dcterms:creator: Edmonton Japanese Community Association History Committee
metadata.dcterms:description: A collection of personal histories of Edmonton-area people with Japanese heritage (e.g. Japanese-Canadian, Japanese citizens who have spent time in Edmonton area). These are based on responses to the the 2013 EJCA community survey and augmented with information collected later.
metadata.dcterms:type: Text from survey responses and composed essays
